text: ql lahum -ayha alrswl-: la 'astatie 'an adfe ean nafsi drana, wala ajlb laha nfeana, 'iilaa ma sha' allah 'an yadfae eaniy min drr 'aw yajlib li min nfe. likuli qawm waqt lanqda' mudatihim wajlhm, 'iidha ja' waqt anqda' 'ajaluhum wfna' aemarhm, fala yastakhirun eanh saeatan fyumhlwn, wala yataqadam 'ajaluhum ean alwaqt almelwm
